Good coffee, hot to taste, quiet, quick
I love this coffee maker and it‚Äôs the perfect size for sitting on my counter top.

review name: Much better than the Keurig single mini cup.
review text: Smaller foot print than Keurig Mini. The Instabrew has a water reservoir and multiple-size options for brewing. Let's hope it last longer. The Keurig only made about 125 brews before it died.

I returned the first Instant Pot Solo because thought it was defective. The pots lid would not close completely, my daughter has one and hers closed perfectly. Besides that I loved the pot and the brew so I quickly ordered another and that's when I discovered the problem. I had not noticed or read in the instruction booklet that there's a slight opening at the top of the pod. The cover for the pod has to fit into that opening allowing the top to close completely. Hope this saves you a unnecessary return.
Its been working perfectly. Makes a very quick cup of coffee. My wife uses it with T bags and she loves it too. Glad I purchased this one
I was loving this little machine but after 6 months it leaks when brewing

review name: Great machine for a great HOT cup of coffee!
review text: Great flavor. I‚Äôve only had the coffee maker for a few months now, but it still delivers a good hot cup of coffee!
just got this yesterday and so far so good. makes my tea in like 15 to 30 seconds...
Makes a good, quick cup of coffee. Like the "bold" feature. Like the reservoir for water. Pro Tip: Read the manual. I know it seems easy to use, but the manual does have some hidden features in it.

review name: Hot, quick, easy and good tasting coffee!
review text: There are some negative reviews but don‚Äôt let that stop you from trying! Maybe they just got a bad machine. I almost did not even bother to try because of negative reviews but I needed a compact coffee maker and loved the versatility of using my own grounds. It is lightweight but everything seems like good solid, quality components. The price point is good. It‚Äôs easy to clean and make a cup of coffee, fast, offers different sizes and bold option. I‚Äôve used the heck out of it for the past 1-2 months before this review. I did go ahead and purchase the protection plan but Amazon is great for CS so you can feel good about trying this machine out for yourself!

review name: The very good and not so good
review text:
It has some great features...the compact size, fits comfortably under the cabinet, the lit touch pad, the audible bell sound,, the really hot coffee, nice size water container. Would prefer it yo have a 3 prong plug.
The draw back is the unit does not close tightly when using the ground coffee pod. It majorly drips out very hot water while brewing.
Sadly I'm returning it.

I haven't given up on it, but so far the majority of my cups of coffee have had coffee grounds in them which is definitely not something I enjoy. Is it because the bottom needle is too big? Is it because the end of the process blows steam and pressure enough to push grounds through to the cup?

I'm sure this won't be a problem if I use the included reusable pod, but I have a lot of coffee pods on hand before I get to that.
Super easy to use,, I love it..

review name: It was good while it lasted
review text: I liked this coffee maker. It was easy to use and made coffee. What more could I ask? My issue is that it only lasted 5 months, then it started to produce clouds of vapor that smelled smoky to me. My sense of smell is not very good, so I wasn't sure what I was smelling, but in any case the new clouds of steam and the loudness were new and unwelcome. I sent a message to the supplier and have not heard from them for several days, so I have no choice but to return the unit.
This is by far the best coffee maker i have ever had. I like it better than a Kuerig.

I've had my Solo coffee maker just under 5 months and it started being inconsistent with the strength of the brew. I've regularly cleaned it, including a couple of vinegar runs. Also, the coffee isn't as hot as I would expect or like. If I add milk from the refrigerator, I need to heat it in the microwave.
makes a mess while dispensing coffee otherwise everything else is great

I thought it was a nice idea to have a two in 1 K cup coffee maker. It was no different from the other ones. It had a separate little container where you could pour your ground coffee in. Something I was already doing with my other K cup machine . I thought it actually had an area to pour your coffee ground. I thought, well I‚Äôll still keep it because I love the BOLD button. it did make the coffee stronger. Then I use the little container for my ground coffee. I did exactly what I was supposed to do. suddenly Water Spewed out the top of the Coffee maker. I mean overall it‚Äôs a pretty good machine except for that problem.

This coffee maker is the best. I tried two other kinds...a Krupp single brew and a Vimukun single serve. The Krupps wasn't bad, but it didn't take k-cups, only loose ground coffee. The Vimukun lasted three days before it quit making a full cup...I had to run it twice. I sent them both back. This Instant coffee maker takes either k-cup or loose grounds and has it's own measuring spoon that doubles as the filter. I own an Instant Pot and found it very reliable, so I thought I'd give this a go. So happy! Tastes better than my Kerig and is quieter.

review name: Makes the best cup of coffee
review text: Love everything about it. It's does not take up alot of space and it's not too tall.
This is the best coffee maker I've ever had. No surprise since it's Instantpot brand. Great flavor, quiet, fast, strong flavor, and finally a HOT cup of coffee! Love it.

review name: A quick cup of amazing coffee. Love how I can use my own ground coffee
review text:
Super easy to use.

Excellent strong coffee
I have been using this for a month.

Nice to have a strong cup within just 2 minutes

I love how it comes with the option to use its reusable pod so that I can enjoy my favorite coffee brand exactly how I like it.

review name: Your choice of Hot Drinks So Quickly
review text: Designed for ease of use and maintenance, size is perfect for any size kitchen or breakroom.

Good quality machine! Unfortunately, it doesn't make the most flavorful cup of coffee. Even when using the "Bold" setting!

I started off using k-cup pods but found that they had zero flavor. Truly awful, watery, bland, sad. So I switched to using the reusable basket and grinding my own beans in the morning. Still using the Bold setting. Still not great. However it's an improvement and good enough for rushed mornings where you dont have much time but need a little caffeine to get you going.

If I had to do it all over again, I would not buy this machine and can't recommend it for true coffee lovers.

And this is the best! We love this coffee maker! You can do Keurig pods or your own ground coffee. So many choices and flexibility! This is very easy to use and even my vision-impaired husband is able to use it on his own.

When I first got this coffee maker, it worked perfectly! I did a "clean" water cycle before using it as suggested and followed all instructions. Now after only a month of using it, all the lights keep flashing when I turn it on. The instruction booklet doesn't tell me what it means when all the buttons flash at once. It will start to make coffee, but will only do about half of the amount it's supposed to, with lots of steam and squealing (not supposed to happen). I reached out to customer support. We'll see if they make it right!
Given a cup size choice, there is a button if you want it strong, it's quick, and does what it needs to do.
two things are bothersome about this machine the spillage when the coffee is brewing because the mug sits too low and the lack of being able to purchase extra reusable pods
I don‚Äôt know how I lived before this coffee maker! Fantastic! Looks good too !
It works, I like it , simple to use , no issues besides a little splatter. üëç
Water tank works great and brewer is fast

Love not having to refill water after each use .
Coffee use only
This is a great single cut coffee maker. Easy to operate. Love everything about the machine especially the size and the flavor it gives the coffee
No matter what coffee is put in this unit, it seems to make watered down, weak coffee. I like the unit itself and love the convenience. I have had it for 3/4 year and it is very consistent.
Works great and it‚Äôs easy to use for single use . Small size fits anywhere
Finally not relying on kcups alone ground coffee beans with reusable kcup provided and great taste with available bold brew selection.

review name: Great Coffee Maker - Not Compatible with Eco Pods
review text: I have really enjoyed this coffee maker but was disappointed when I found out you are unable to use the Eco Pods that are now available.

After it makes the cup, the rest of the water leaks out of the bottom of the coffee maker.. It did it once and I thought I did something wrong.. After the second time I watched it just leak out onto the counter. So no I'm not satisfied with this product at all.

review name: Compatible reusable k- cups are expensive. .
review text: If you gonna use reusables then prepare to spend half of that price for a few k-cups. Looks ok . Compact. Works fine so far.
Impressive and beyond that I expect. Beautiful and efficient, skinny fix in any corner of the kitchen. Water reservoir last for 3 12 Oz of coffee or tea.

review name: Who knew Instant Pot could make a decent pod coffee maker?? Love this!
review text: I decided to wait a bit before submitting a review. I have had this for 2 months now, using daily for 1 cup of coffee, and it has worked great. I love that it is a bit smaller than my previous Keurig machine, yet it has a decent sized water reservoir so I only have to fill it every few days. For the price, I would definitely recommend this product.
Video Player is loading.

After losing my second Keurig after descaling I chose to get this. It‚Äôs simple to use and brews hot. We love using the refillable cup for coffee grounds. We like the Dunkin‚Äô Donuts bagged coffee. With the price of everything going up, it‚Äôs cheaper too. It‚Äôs small and holds a decent amount of water. The only downfall is it does not have an alert for an empty water reservoir. It will start to brew but won‚Äôt finish. Took a few times but have gotten good about just making sure it has water.

review name: The flavour of the coffee . Absolutely top rate.
review text: I‚Äôm a dyed in the wool expresso snob. I generally don‚Äôt like coffee brewed by other people. It‚Äôs not far off a several thousand dollar Gaggia manual express machine that I own . It was purchased for a quick cup on the run, but has far exceeded expectations. Good body, great aroma, and really quick if you‚Äôre on the go.

I bought this on prime day special price to replace my keurig coffee maker, works a lot faster than keurig. I had nothing but problems with the keurig would only give you 2 ozs of coffee then you had to do again
This was even after cleaning, never will I buy keurig again
This coffee maker is fast at giving a 10oz cup of coffee using the bold
Coffee is hot also. Only have tried it twice and so far so good
Hopefully it will last a long time
Have a gift and it works as it should.

Our Keurig died, so decided to try a different brand. The Instant Pot Solo 2 in 1 Single Serve coffee maker so far is outperforming the Keurig. The bold option feature really makes a better cup of coffee than the Keurig. In addition to K-cup pods, I have also used the reusable filter holder for using regular coffee grounds, with good results. The Instant Pot also seems to be better made. We have only used this for about a month, so time will tell how reliable it will be.

review name: Great single serve cup of coffee
review text: This machine is great! I am a coffee device, perfectionist. I have a Bonavita coffee pot which brews the best hot coffee a coffee maker can the Instant solo serve makes the same quality cup of coffee. Easy to clean, quick brewing , coffee saving , and it takes up very little room .

review name: It's ok, but I returned it
review text: I bought this because you can make a single cup, in 90 seconds, and you don't need the coffee pods. It did all that. But with the reusable pod that comes with it, it leaves a really thick sludge at the bottom of your cup and this really ruins the taste. So I ended up returning it.

review name: Coffee is hot, and brews quickly. Uses regular grounds coffee or kcups
review text: Very easy to use.
Gifted to a family that had never used a single serve coffee maker. They love the ease of it.
Does everything a keurig does but better, faster, and for less money

This coffee machine is so nice. So easy to use. Coffee is great. Bold setting is nice for when I make iced coffee. This is my first kcup type machine. It‚Äôs very nice. I have used both k cups and reusable k cup. Both work great. Love it!

I like that it‚Äôs a great countertop space-saver with full functions of a bigger model. I have a Nespresso coffee maker, but my husband prefers the flavor of a Keurig-type model. This was a birthday surprise, and he‚Äôs happy! I‚Äôm happy because I can drink coffees I‚Äôve missed. I LOVE the scoop feature so you‚Äôre not trying to pour coffee grounds in a small reusable pod while spilling grounds everywhere. This set up is far neater. So we‚Äôre happy with this purchase!

review name: Fast, compact, sleek, but won't purchase again.
review text:
EDIT: I have now had this several months and it suddenly doesn't want to work (one of the two). I cleaned, descaled, etc. Puffs of steam, very slow trickle of coffee and awful noises. I had such high hopes, and this was my last effort of single brews because I have tried them all. This one only lasted three months. Even the competition gives me a year! So sad ...

I purchased two during prime days in Black and Red, one for home and one for office. Both for personal use. For a single brew machine, overall it is fine. I like it fine. I love the appearance, the chimes it makes are cute. For a smaller machine the reservoir holds a good amount of water and it heats well and fast. All important in my world. I am very impatient and love coffee constantly.
Now the not favorite parts. I dislike the fact that my favorite ecopods (kcups) cannot be used properly in it. The holder is not wide enough and you literally have to hold the lid in order for it to brew, which probably isn't a good idea. Or the other thing I have done if I wake in a good mood or have time I cut open and dump the grounds into the provided basket. Now the provided basket for grounds could use improvement as well. I don't hate it, but I've used better from other brands.
Overall, not a bad little machine, but without the ability to use ecopods properly, I would not purchase again and now I have two ... My thought is one may go in our camper where it isn't used every day and the other packed away for a backup.
I don't hate it, but we aren't best friends.

Purchased for ease of making a single cup of coffee instead of brewing a pot of coffee. Very pleased with this purchase! I love that it includes a reusable pod to use coffee grounds of choice. The reusable pod is what we use the most. However, k-cups fit and we have used for an even easier cup of coffee. Purchased on Prime Day, so the price was hard to beat. We really like this product!

review name: It's mine and wonderful l ‚ù§Ô∏è it
review text: It's very easy to use and clean just plain and simple

review name: Just as good as other brands
review text: This product is great for your one cup of coffee. Like the fact it has a 36 Oz. Water reservoir.
Easy to use and clean.
Brews hot coffee fast! Super easy to use. Flexibility of using K-cup pods or your own coffee using included reusable pod. Super easy to refill water reservoir.

I previously ordered a Keriug Mini Plus, but after 3 brews it was dead. It also was kinda noisy. This from Instant, is very quiet, not messy, easy to use and brews a good cup of coffee. If it dribbles a bit after brewing, before removing your cup, remove the k-cup first. If you are really picky like me, shove a paper towel in the k-cup hole. Next, close the lid and remove your cup. This greatly reduces the amount of "dribble".
It does not make a strong/bold cup of coffee.

From the 1st cup of coffee that was brewed, right out of the packaging, (I've now made 6) the coffee maker spills at LEAST 1/2 of the pod of grounds into the bottom of the coffee cup! I've cleaned the ports with a paper clip, of which I shouldn't of even had to do, because the unit was brand new, cleaned the cup in the center & did everything as instructed in the directions before using & it STILL leaves a bunch of grounds behind in the bottom of the coffee cup! I use this unit downstairs in my family room. I have a Keurig upstairs in my kitchen (it's 4 years old) & I've NEVER had an issue with that one. I would NOT recommend this coffee maker to anyone! I can't return it now, because I no longer have the packaging AND it's been used. This unit is NOT worth buying!
Fantastic way to make coffee with zero mess and great flavor

I bought this to make cappuccino and iced cappuccino. I am not a coffee drinker but this thing is amazing. I used to have a Keurig, two actually and they never seemed to work. It was so frustrating. The Instant Solo works like a charm and is so much quicker. I highly recommend it!
I don't have alot of counter space and this is perfect I'm glad I chose this one

Good concept. However,
coffee splatters everywhere while brewing. Usually needs wiped down after each brew.
I bought this in October & it stopped working in April - it only lasted 6 months. I expected it to last longer.
Very fast brew time. Holds just the right amount of water for morning coffee.

Our existing coffee maker died suddenly - pump for water failed. I didn't want to order the same one so I checked the reviews on the Amazon offerings. The Instant Pot solo seemed to have the features I needed most. We ordered it and had it within 2 days.
I'm happy with this coffee maker: 40 ounce water reservoir, buttons are part of the surface of the brewing lid, slim profile on our counter plus we can use our own generic pods with my Dunkin donuts bag of coffee. Win, win!
slim line minimal counter space . Makes great fresh ground coffee

We purchased the instant solo in August 2022, and had really high hopes. It operated fairly well; although at times all the lights would flash, and we would have to start again. This morning, 1/1/23, it started blowing steam, and the motor sounded like it was dying. Although it should be under warranty, we would have to mail it back to the manufacturer who happens to be in Canada. Who wants to pay the postage? Sad, because we really loved its small size (compared to Keurig). I see now there are many manufacturers making this small size, so‚Ä¶ We will try something else.
Not what I was expecting. First it‚Äôs awkward to remove and replace the water container. Reason I‚Äôll return is the coffee isn‚Äôt hot. My older system makes a much hotter cup than this one.
Like the so much better than the others out there as it's easier to fill and clean.
I like everything about this pot. Easy to use and makes great coffee.
Nice item. Downside is stated cup size ( Used pyrex 2 cup measuring cup) dispenses 2 oz more that stated. Just adjust fresh coffee and liquid for pods. Great result.
Great gift

This is SO easy to use
Less counter space and the pod it has removed and cleans and fills so easy!
Using less coffee on 8 bold.
When it‚Äôs time to clean I can run cleaner diy like I want
This replaces the kurig which needed filter and their cleaner. Also the refillable pod was not this easy to use
This has a handle making no mess at all! I love this! Got the red ~
It fit perfectly in the spot I had the big Krups coffee maker.
A fresh cup of coffee in 60-90 seconds.
So happy with my coffee magic maker !!
Recipient commented the good quality and timely gift.

I've had many coffee makers in my life, including Mr. Coffee, Cuisinart, Hamilton Beach, and Keurig. This coffee maker from the makers of instant pot is by far my favorite. The few negative reviewers either received a lemon (faulty) product or more likely just didn't use the coffee maker correctly.
Very quick to brew & good flavor

I have spent hours researching single serve coffee makers and finally decided to purchase this one. I absolutely love it. Small enough I can leave it on my desk at work or take it on the road with me. Coffee tastes great! I am glad I bought this single serve - I would recommend to anyone looking for a coffee maker that doesn't want it taking up much space.

I love my Instant Pot and expected the same attention to detail and quality with the solo coffee maker. But it simply is not constructed to use the eco-pods, such as my favorite coffee brand, Cameron's. I found that I could force the issue and manually hold the top down during brewing, but frankly, the feel of the quality of the item made me concerned that this maneuver would shorten the life of the appliance. If you use the regular plastic K-cups it works fine, but still, it doesn't't have that solid, substantial feel to it like the (more expensive) Mueller that we had before, and ended up ordering again after returning this one.

review name: It didn't last long at all
review text: I liked this item when I purchased it. Unfortunately, it only lasted 3 months.
Excelente f√°cil de utilizar y montar , calidad Excelente

review name: Amended Review, Messy originally, Now died at 8 months
review text:
Easy to use. Variable size cup brewing is convenient.
However, be prepared for spatter all around the dispenser. It doesn‚Äôt seem to matter what height your mug/cup is. There is also a mess just inside where the pod holder sits. This design needs improved- constant clean of splatter is an issue.

Purchased last July, now March. The features were nice, function always messy. Yesterday it just died. We resuscitated it once about a month ago, going thru troubleshooting steps. Now it just doesn‚Äôt work. Reading the questions asked on the site, it appears that the problems are still on-going. I have just sent the info about purchase to their support. I will try getting back with what they respond (3/12/2023)

I would not recommend this product.

review name: Started off great but quit working in less than 3 weeks
review text:
After our keurig up and died, I decided to branch out and try a new brand. I love my instant pots so I figured the brands coffee maker would be great. It looks nice. It's easy to operate. Love the bold function.
However not even 3 weeks later it has started steaming, chiming, lighting up, and only pushing water out. I've tried everything to remedy it but no such luck.
Extremely disappointed to see that this is not a rare malfunction at all. Will be returning.
Replaced my Keurig with this, loved my keurig just got worn out, but I like this one better. Very quiet and quick. Makes a great cup of coffee.

review name: Can‚Äôt clean top of unit without touching on off
review text: Good product for the money

My 4th Keurig maker quit and I decided I would try this coffee maker out. I love that it is smaller, quiet, easy to clean, same speed, and the water reservoir holds 40 ounces. Even better that is is less than half the price!

This is a nice coffee maker. Easy to use, makes great coffee, and fast. If I wanted to say anything negative, I wish I could use a taller cup. I travel some and use taller cups on the go, but it‚Äôs fast enough I just make two cups and pour into one. Glad I made the purchase

Easy to set up and use. Easy to clean.

My husband was not enthusiastic about a cup at a time machine. Now he‚Äôs a fan and uses it several times a day and has told others how much he likes it.

We make coffee, tea (tea bags and loose), hot chocolate, hot water for oatmeal, grits and condensed soup. Works like a charm every time.

We purchased additional reusable k-cups so that coffee and tea flavors don‚Äôt mix. Just wish we could purchase the same one it come with. We love the handle on it. If they ever sell them individually we will be buying a couple extra.

Great product!

I recently inherited a bunch of K Cups from work and thought I‚Äôd give it a try. I‚Äôm a French Press junkie and the thought of an instant cup versus the process of the press might save me some precious am time. The coffee just isn‚Äôt that good. It was a bit better from the actual Keurig machine at my old office. Would rather just use French Press.

I love this little machine. It‚Äôs so easy to use and coffee tastes great. I‚Äôve tried Starbucks coffee in the bag before but could never get the measurements right but with k cups it‚Äôs so easy and tastes great. Everyone in my family wants to use it now instead of the pot now

review name: I love my new solo coffee maker. It makes a delicious bold cup of coffee.
review text: It is easy to clean. The flavor of the coffee is delicious strong bold cup of coffee just what you want first thing in the morning. I definitely recommend this coffee maker.

review name: Makes a great cup of coffee and easy to use
review text:
It‚Äôs very quiet and easy to use. I like the bold option for those times that you want a longer brew and need a stronger cup of coffee.
Looks stylish and takes up minimum room on my countertop.
The only negative is it does not support an Eco pod that I usually purchase from Cameron coffee‚Äòs. It does however, come with a reusable filter so you can put any ground coffee in it. Very pleased with this purchase!

I‚Äôve had several Keurigs die on me or malfunction. Wanted a replacement coffee maker that uses K-cups. Doesn‚Äôt have bells and whistles that really aren‚Äôt necessary. Consistently makes good cup of coffee and very simple to use.

review name: I'm mad that I like this so much.
review text: I have always been a coffee snob, grinding and at times even roasting my own beans. I go this on a recommendation from a friend that couldn't say enough about it. I have never given k-cups a try because I felt they were just an excuse to limit how much coffee I could use. Well they do use about half of the beans I normally use per cup, but the flavor is there so, I can't really fault this machine. Finally, I have to say that I love how fast my coffee is brewed.

Love this coffee maker.
I love that fresh ground coffee can be used when not using k cups. easy to use, easy to clean.
The unit has a small footprint so it uses very little space on your counter.
A definite recommendation if you're looking for a versatile coffee maker.
I wish it had a larger reservoir but it is fine

I wanted to get a smaller coffeemaker as we don't have a lot of counter space. I love the Instant brand, so I thought I would give this a try. I read several reviews that had stated negative things about it, but took a chance anyways. I drink a lot of coffee, and I have had this for several months now, and it's still brewing great. I have had zero issues. It makes a great cup of coffee as well.
Fast and easy to use. Don‚Äôt have to wait minutes for water to heat up.

review name: Best mid-grade single serve coffee maker
review text: It‚Äôs better than the cheapest, and as good as the more expensive options. Take reusable filters, and narrow face / long profile fits nicely on the counter top. Seems easier the clean, doesn‚Äôt need charcoal packets.
Coffee is fast & hot
ease of use

review name: Worked great for 3 weeks then stopped
review text: Push the start button and it shuts off. Contacted company and they said to do some quick fix. We did that and worked for 1 morning and the next back to shutting off.

I have had the famous name brand before, so that‚Äôs what my comparison is. When I wake up too tired to make coffee, I want a pot that works the first time and that even a dunce can use. You can see that it‚Äôs attractive. It also has big buttons that light up. For this price, I think it‚Äôs a great purchase.

I‚Äôve had 4 single serve coffee makers in the past, two were keurig, and this one from instant pot is my favorite. I‚Äôve had it a couple of months, use it every day, with no problems. Easy to use, easy to clean. Large reservoir for water. Would recommend and definitely buy again.

review name: Nice and hot. Easy to use and clean.
review text: Coffee

This was great (best k-cup coffee maker I had) until it broke today. Purchased May 2022 so I am very disappointed.
FYI - I used filtered water so hard water build up is not the problem.

Instant Single Coffee Maker worked fine for 5 months then it started spitting coffee grounds everywhere. It started building up steam instead of sending out water & the steam (I assume) would explode the k-cup at the bottom & grounds went everywhere! I am very disappointed because it makes good coffee.

My sister gave me one of these for Christmas - it's great. Love it, in fact. So much so that I bought another one just like it for our lake house, where I had a Keurig that died last fall. The second coffee maker does not work. At all. It didn't work the first time I used it. No heat, for starters. And it only fills your coffee cup about one a quarter of an inch at time. I managed to make a terrible cup of coffee this morning by turning the machine off, then on again, about 20 times. And there were grounds in it. Lots. Really, really unhappy about this - and now worried about the coffee maker at home. Don't waste your money on this!

Small - good for travel, which is why we bought it.
Only now it sits next to my Bunn on the kitchen counter.
I especially like the small K-Cup screen to use my own coffee.
And it is tough!! I dropped the unit on my kitchen floor and it is still perfect. No cracks.
Great product!!!
This one cup coffee maker is great, easy to use and fast. I always had 8 cup coffee makers but the one cup is so much better and fresher.

This is difficult. I like the design. Seems well made. The coffee cartridge has issues. It lets too much grounds through during brewing. Even on bold the coffee is weak. I got some tiny filters but it is hard to load them and get enough coffee in them and then stick them in the little cartridge. I may get a Kreig reusable cartridge and try it.

review name: Exactly what I was looking for!
review text: I'm the only one that drinks coffee in the house, so wanted a reliable unit that works great with both pods and fresh ground coffee --- has some water holding capacity so I don't have to pour in a cup every time and doesn't take up a ton of space. Very happy with it, met all these criteria and the first time I haven't had a bunch of grinds at the bottom of my cup in a long time! -first review I have ever written~
Easy to use

Great Quality single cup coffee maker. Works with both K Cups and your own coffee. It comers with a filter for your own coffee. However, the sediment passes through when making your own coffee. Advisable to buy third-party small K Cup sized paper coffee filters which work well.
Sometimes the water goes out of the conteiner
Loved this when I received it January 5, 2023. However, about five days ago it began to make loud noises and smoked like crazy. It certainly isn't worth the price. Do not buy this!
At the end of the cycle the pod would pop and spill coffee grains all in my cup of coffee. Sent it back
Just like the pictures and the post
Video Player is loading.

Exactly like the original that came with my instant pot coffee maker. My puppy decided to turn the original into his chew toy, rendering it unusable. I‚Äôm pleased with the purchase and would recommend this product to others.

review name: Very fast and makes a great cup
review text: This pot is fast, easy to use and clean, and unobtrusive on the countertop. It makes a good cup of coffee and accommodates our large travel mugs. The water reservoir is easy to fill and holds more than enough for two 12 ounce mugs.

I LOVE this coffee maker!!! It is so easy and quick to use and maintain! My 5 and 12 year old even love using it! The temperature is super hot and always the same temp with each cup! Takes minutes to take apart, clean and reassemble.

We love it better than the more expensive brand!!

***UPDATE***
A little over a month in (just past the return date!) It started getting loud, taking longer to brew and even backed up and spewed coffee everywhere out the top!! I use distilled water and I still descale 1X per week because I know our tap water causes mineral build up on water appliances (already had to throw one of the more expensive brand single serve machines and a humidifier in the trash) so we use distilled water for pretty much everything but cooking! I knew it most likely wouldn't be quite as fast as the pricier brand but I didn't think it would take 4-5 minutes sometimes! I might as well brew a whole pot at about 3 minutes longer!! And the noise!! It is so loud I can hear it in my bedroom with a fan going!! I really wanted to love this but I'm in search of a new brand and cannot recommend this one at all!!

I love this coffee maker. Worked well since purchased on July 12, 2022. This morning machine started making hot steam and no coffee. Just hot water. This product last two weeks after return window closed.

I had so much trouble with my Keurig single serve coffee maker, because the button you push to start the coffee worked very sporadically, and I would often get cold and weak coffee. I absolutely love the Instant Solo Serve Coffee maker. It is so easy to use with the option of 8, 10, and 12 oz., and a bold setting. It makes a perfect cup of coffee every time, and it is done in 90 seconds. I'm so happy I bought this. Donna

I love this little machine. I previously had a Keurig 2.0, but this is better. The ability to use ground coffee without all the plastic waste is a big plus. Also, there‚Äôs no wait for it to heat up so you don‚Äôt have to leave it turned on all the time.
Love that you don't have to use the keurig pods for this, it has a reusable pod! I have made chi tea with loose leaf tea mix and it worked fantastic üôå
I like the slim built design, ease of operation and quick dispensing of coffee.
Easy to use I like it so far had two weeks
Bought this in July had to descale it three and now it's now it not working

I LOVE this coffee maker so much, I ordered another one in a different color. I will also buy it as Christmas gifts for friends. It makes great coffee, delivers in seconds literally and has a "bold" option for added flavor. LOVE!

It's awesome how quick it is at brewing. Almost immediately after pushing the button, there's coffee coming out. However, mine splattered all over the place. There were drops on the counter and the coffee maker. Also, the coffee was more bitter. I drink the same thing every morning because I enjoy how smooth it is. Not today. Not a keeper.
Mine lasted six months. Today, when I turned it on...it made weird noises and was producing a lot of steam.. Hot water came down.....but no coffee. So sad!
This makes cups of strong coffee because it has a bold setting. Which is good. Unfortunately non of the kcups I have fit in it. And this company doesn‚Äôt seem to make extra baskets for the coffee.

I bought this on July 15th I drink 2 cups of coffee A-day After using it for 2 month
If it works at ..if you love coffee in the morning think twice
Works like a charm after regular use months later
I bought it for my wife who only drinks tea. Have only had it a week but it works well. Heats water quickly and we also use the included filter with tea leaves.
Four months, almost to the day, and it quit working. I have experience troubleshooting Keurigs at work. Nothing seems wrong, except it's not brewing coffee.

It's fast heating water to make 1 cup of coffee at a time.
cup is sometimes difficult, leaks around top. Still Okay for a hot cup of java.
This is 2nd one I've purchased. Nice to have home made coffee
and this makes 1 cup in 30 seconds. Great
Unfortunately only 2 months in and it is not brewing properly. Very disappointed.
Hazard. After less than a week it had began to spit out hot water on me. I've emailed the company multiple times , and for the first time ever; a company doesn't respond to my emails.

I am soo happy that I purchased this coffee maker. This is the first single use coffee maker I‚Äôve purchased, and it has saved me so much time, and money, because of all the coffee that I was wasting previously. It‚Äôs so nice to be able to make myself a cup of coffee in the afternoon for a little pick me up, and not have to wait for a coffee pot to brew a couple cups, and then having to waste the remaining. You will love this coffee maker!

review name: Watery Coffee - Like Pod Coffee Makers
review text:
This coffee maker isn't that different from any other pod-brewing device (Keurig). If you like pod-coffee and want a sustainable and easy option, then this will work well for you. It's intuitive, simple to use, and doesn't take up a lot of space. It has an easily removable water tower for refilling.

I don't like pod coffee. I think it's watery and lacks flavor, and that is exactly what this machine gave me, even on the strongest setting. Even though the features are nice, it is still a pod-brewing device, which is not ultimately what I want.
Brews in 30 seconds! Hot and delicious

It lasted 6 months with one user. Scales up really fast and doesn't descale as well as other brands. I liked the size of this pot but that was about it. Coffee wasn't as good as Kurig or Muller, but not far from those brands. This model needs an upgrade before I'd consider buying this coffee maker again.

I needed a smaller footprint coffemaker in white. Not many options but finally decided to try Instant Pot instead of Kuerig. It seems the Keurigs these days last about one year. The Instant Pot wasn't much cheaper, which is why they need to upgrade:
Pros-nice color and true small footprint. Nice function chimes that can be turned off.
Cons-Cheap looking. Not sleek as pictured, disjointed looking. The main problem is the water tank lid has no handle or indent making it cumbersome/painful to use for someone with arthritis or impaired dexterity. A handle on the water tank would also help.
For those who want their coffee NOW, this is not the pot for you. It's the slowest coffee brewing system I've ever had. For almost $100 I don't know that I'll keep it.
Bought this for my husband to surprise him when he gets home. Product was delivered today however the water tank is cracked. :(

The Coffee machine works great in all aspects. The only problem is the Water Reservoir. It is made of very cheap plastic that breaks very easily. It was dropped a few times and broke every time. We have glued it together but it should really be made of stronger material. Never had this problem with a Keurig machine.
I likes that it‚Äôs easy to use and allows you to use your own coffee in the reusable pod

This little instant pot gets the job done. It makes coffee fast, it has good Flavor and it‚Äôs hot. It‚Äôs nice, compact and I like the fact that it has a reservoir for the water. The only small grip that I have the lid does not want to close tightly once you put a pod in and it does slash some however it gets the job done.

review name: Smaller counter footprint than the Kurig and coffee taste better
review text: I love this coffee maker. I bought it to replace my Kurig and like it a lot better. The reservoir is the same size but the machine takes up a lot less space on my counter top. It can go from turned off to a cup of coffee in around a min. so it is faster. My husband wishes there was an option for a smaller cup of coffee but overall is as pleased as I am.

Truth be told, I‚Äôve been a ‚ÄúKeurig only‚Äù snob for years. But they always broke. I‚Äôve gone through 5 machines. This machine fixed all the issues. No clogs, no filthy extra pieces, nothing but a solid working machine. Made this Keurig user switch for good! Thank you!

review name: that it doesn't clean well only have it for month,
review text: not working well coffee string very slow, try to clean it light keep flashing water not coming out .

After going thru 3 Keurigs since November, I decided no more and so I looked for other brands. I love the InstaPot. It is so much easier to use. Much quieter, quicker and the flavor from my K-cups is so much richer. It stores much easier under my cabinet. LOVE IT and would highly recommend it.

review name: Good quality product and elegant design
review text:
It‚Äôs a coffee pot‚Ä¶ I love having 3 different cup sizes and an option for more ‚Äúbold‚Äù coffee.. though I can‚Äôt imagine how the machine can make bolder coffee‚Ä¶
I‚Äôm very happy with it. Easy from start to finish and it looks elegant.
The cup has to be filled by spoonful. Can‚Äôt just dip into the grounds or you have a mess. Not easy to tap out wet grounds and expect it to be clean. Hubby still uses but I returned to using pods.

review name: A Great Addition to My Kitchen
review text: I've had this for a couple of weeks now and I am so happy with it! The flexibility this offers with being able to use any ground coffee of choice as well as any K-cups is exactly what I was looking for. It's easy to use, easy to clean and makes a great cup of coffee. I have used this almost every day since I received it and haven't had any issues.
Very easy to use and clean

review name: Great at first, won‚Äôt last long.
review text: Loved this at first! However, it‚Äôs only been a few months and it‚Äôs making a lot of noise and not filling properly, acts as though it‚Äôs out of water when it‚Äôs not, etc. I‚Äôm sad it only worked well for about 4 months.
Great little machine. Yet 8oz =10oz. 10oz =12 and so on. Make sure your cup can handle it. Bought for a club and now we need to buy larger cups. If not would have been 5 stars.

review name: The proof is in the tasting.
review text: This coffee brewer was beautiful and easy to use, but it left an absolutely terrible plastic taste in the coffee after cleaning according to instructions and running multiple brews through it. I was terribly disappointed.
Very easy to set up and use compared to other units. It is small and compact. It is new to me so I haven't cleaned it yet. Highly recommend.

review name: Great coffee make for small spaces
review text: I loved the fact that this coffee maker takes up very little space on our camper kitchen counter. The water comes out very hot and quickly. Great for making hot water for tea, also. Highly recommend over the single serve Keurig that I returned.

Absolutely love it! I personally feel it is better than the Keurig K-Mini Plus Coffee Maker. I love the option for stronger coffee and the water reservoir is a littler smaller than the Keurig, so it is lighter and easier to remove and put back in. It is also perfect in size and so easy to clean.
Works very well!

The coffee it brews is perfectly fine, but every time it leaks water and coffee out all over the place. You can‚Äôt move the base up to get the cup closer to the top so there is no way to avoid splattering as well. Now I have to put paper towels in front to make sure coffee doesn‚Äôt spill down my countertop all over the floor. There are many better options for the price point, this is a regret purchase.

This is an awesome little coffee maker! It's quiet and makes the coffee pretty quickly. I love the removable water reservoir and the option for a bold cup of java. It's nice and compact so it doesn't take up much counter space. If you're on the fence, I'd definitely say to go for it!!!
10/10 would recommend. Easy to use, fast, and even has a little song played with it‚Äôs finished making your cup of coffee.

Received yesterday. Start using today. Easy to use. Doesn‚Äôt take up much space. Makes a nice hot cup of coffee. So far so good. I‚Äôd say, give it a try. Good purchase. If anything changes, I‚Äôll update my review.

review name: So far a couple weeks in and it works great.
review text: So far so good. Wish the water resevoir held a little more but other than that its great so far. Hope it lasts longer than a year like my last coffee maker.
I liked concept but I had problems with on switch - just wouldn‚Äôt work
The top of pod does not fit properly on top so it‚Äôs unusable. The coffee goes all over. very disappointed. Was waste of money

I really like this machine. I currently grind my beans and use the reusable ‚Äúk-cup‚Äù. Coffee brews quickly and tastes fresh. I can brew 3 ten ounce cups from one water tank filling. I‚Äôm very happy with my purchase. It sits nicely on the counter in my small kitchen. Slim design works great for space saving. Very happy with purchase.

review name: Product broke within 3 days of opening
reviewer's name: I just bought it and it broke within 5 cups of coffee. I‚Äôm so sad.
review text: Video Player is loading.

review name: Easy to use but not great for using coffee grounds.
review text: Love the easy to use features and colors! However it‚Äôs not the best at making a cup of coffee with your own grounds.

Very disappointed with this sigle cup brewer. It makes VERY weak tasting coffee compared to my old Keuring coffee maker. Even when brewed on bold it is weak tasting, unfortunately, I will be returning this unit.

We have a Keurig and just got this one for entertainment and making the same coffee on both machines and you can tell the difference. Instant Pot Solo makes a better coffee cup than Keurig one. So if you are in between single serving machines this one gets you the best results.
I really like how amazing it is !

I received a used product! Was not happy about that. Although it was wrapped like it had never been open, there was coffee splatters on the machine and no instructions or pamphlet in the box. Not happy I paid for a new product and received ( a returned/ used item)
I wanted to love this but when you make a cup of coffee it leaks out the top and make a mess every where.

review name: Great coffee maker. so handy too.
review text: I liked every thing about this coffee maker.

If my headline doesn't say it then buy one we all know Amazon stands by the products they sell. I love the machine it is easy to put together took me about 5 min. and the coffee tastes great. I have also made tea and hot chocolate. I don't buy pods I use the pod that comes with it, couldn't be easier. If you are looking for an easy to use instant solo machine. Have only had this product a couple of months and it gives an error message (beeping with lights flashing) almost every time I use it which is maybe a couple of times a week. Some YouTube videos recommend cleaning the needles, but I don't think a product this new and infrequently used should be so high maintenance.

Easy setup and easy to use. I bought it, in part, due to the bold function which really makes a difference when making coffee. Another great feature is that it comes with the filter to brew your own coffee instead of having to buy it separately, as with Keurig models.
It seems when it‚Äôs done brewing. It‚Äôs so easy to use much better than the regular Keurig I had

It was time to replace my Keurig mini as I started to have a few issues with it. After reading the reviews, I decided to purchase the Instant solo coffee maker and I am glad that I did! The unboxing and set up was a breeze and after cleaning the coffee maker before use I brewed me a cup! The flavor was ahhh mazing!! I remembered seeing a post about using 2 tsp of ground coffee so, I did that and the coffee was perfect. I would definitely recommend!

I don‚Äôt care for the coffee grounds holder. It‚Äôs hard to get it all put together and it‚Äôs tricky to get the one end into the tiny hole to keep the lid on.

I love the smaller size. Haven‚Äôt needed to clean it yet. Hopefully it goes smoothly.
Replaced an old Kuerig, after reading reviews about the new ones, I decided to try this. It‚Äôs fine for us
Doesn‚Äôt take up much counter space and produces coffee so fast it‚Äôs hard to believe it had time to heat the water. I like that it had a reservoir for a few cups.
easy to use
It‚Äôs really noisy and sounds like it‚Äôs cracking and breaking. When you brew a cup of coffee it‚Äôs strange.

review name: No more K-cups! (but that works too)
review text: The Instant Pot folks have done it again. While a little more expensive than the cheapest Keurig brewers, you get what you pay for. I love the design of this machine. The thing I love most though is that I can use any ground coffee I want to bring a single cup of coffee using the reusable pod (which is also a scoop!). The machine supposedly recognizes when this specific pod is being used and changes the way the coffee is brewed vs. when it brews a K-Cup. No more relying on the regular old K-cups!
Great while it was working. Broke after one month and extremely difficult to get customer service on the phone or in a chat. Very frustrated!

review name: We've fallen in love with this thing.
review text: It makes a cup of coffee quickly with great flavor. I was leery of all the plastic waste, but it turns out that much of the individual k cup is recyclable, or there is a single serving reusable cup for regular ground coffee. It's easy to pack to take on trips, and it beats the usual in-room hotel coffee by a mile.

review name: Only have for a few days but love it so far
review text: Only have for a few days but love it so far. I love the fact that I can use my own coffee and not buy those expensive pods.
Love it...

I loved it until it stopped working properly. Have had it since April 2022. It‚Äôs now just spitting hot water out. I loved its space saving profile and it made good coffee but can‚Äôt stand by a coffee maker that stops working that quickly.

I wanted something very small and compact to fit in my pantry. It fits great with room to spare. It is very easy to use and refill. I have tried both tea and coffee - both tasted great. I am excited to use this daily.

review name: DOES NOT FIT K-CUP TYPE REFILLABLE
review text: I liked the machine. Filling water is easy. However, I tried to use the refillable K-Cup units and they don't fit---the lid won't close.

review name: Sad. Cheaply made. Not all k-cups work despite claim
review text: This coffee maker completely fails the ‚ÄúInstant‚Äù brand quality-build norm. It feels cheaply made as to its assembled form and its material parts. In short it‚Äôs a far cry from the incredible design, material and build quality of our amazing Instant Pot! Yet their prices were similar! Worse yet ‚Äî this kcup maker will not accommodate popular more highly compostable k-cups than keurig DESPITE being advertised to work with All kcup brand coffees. Specifically this machine will not accommodate San Francisco Bay branded compostable k-cups sold by Costco and other merchants.

review name: It does come with the custom pod attachment
review text: I was confused as to whether or not the custom pod scoop attachment came with the main device or if you had to buy it separately.. well I really wanted that piece - which is arguably the sole reason I would buy this device. So I bought a separate one just in case. Well I‚Äôm here to say that it does include the custom pod/scoop in the base device.
Good value. WorkS welL
Makes good coffee, the bold button actually seems to work. Only negative is it does spatter around the base of the unit.

Set on "bold" it is fast and about as full flavored as drip coffee can ever get. Good sized reservoir. Very convenient and space saving. The self fill device in lieu of a K - pot is very useful and economical.

So simple to use! Above picture is showing how it‚Äôs a perfect color match with several of my other kitchen items such as my butter dish. Also what little space it takes up. Yes, the butter dish will be moved!
Best single coffee maker I've owned. It's very easy to use, stylish, easy to see light up buttons, coffee comes out nice and hot, no complaints! I got the gray color and love it. Nice machine.
makes great tasting coffee

It was easy to use and worked well while it lasted. Had an issue few times when it just drips only water and then stops by itself. Despite following instructions for maintenance, it still broke down within 8 months. I do not recommend.

reviewer's name: I bought a size 9 when the boots came. They're very pretty. Could not get my foot into him because it was like a size 3.
review text: When the coffee maker first came it worked great. The second week of owning it it stopped working.

review name: Wonderful until it broke in 6 months
review text: First impressions were great - easy to use, slim storage, with reusable filter cup. However, after 6 months of using (used once a day or every other day), the machine mysteriously broke down, making loud fizzing noises and splashing liquid. I thought it may have needed cleaning, so I bought a descaling solution and ran through the cleaning cycle twice, but it made no difference. I really wish it had lasted.

review name: Just too easy to have a fresh brewed cup....
review text:
I normally have 1 cup of coffee first thing in the morning after I arise. I want it strong, hot, and full bodied. This little space saver from Insta fills the role for me. It is super easy to brew a cup, and so fast that you can have your second cup dripping before you have a chance to change your mind.
The price was right, and my last few weeks have been heaven!

Stopped working after 3-months. I exchanged e-mails with Instant customer support and they didn't identify the reason it stopped working yet informed me my "problem" was NOT under warranty? Having neither spoken to me or identified the issue - they magically knew it was not under warranty. Typical crappy corporate blah, blah, blah... They informed me that although it's not their problem, they are going to send me a (one-time offer) new coffee pot - that translates to our stuff is crap so it's easier to send you a new one than deal with it. BUYER BEWARE.

review name: It splashes and it stopped working after 2 months of light use
Already malfunctioning in less than two months!
review text: What a nightmare... this product has been hit or mostly miss since opening the package less than 60 days ago. We immediately discovered that the coffee disperses in spits and spurts with huge build-up of steam at times. Sounds like a steam locomotive! After splashing the wall and counter top, we decided to use a small French press pitcher (see pic) to try and contain the splashing from pod to cup. Kind of ridiculous, but it helps. Lately, we pick a size to dispense, and it's like the water is not even traveling through the k-cup... there's no COFFEE in our coffee! (see pic) What comes out has not body to it, and resembles a cup of apple juice. SO disappointed since we missed the window to return this junk. AMAZON.... in all fairness, will you PLEASE take this back and refund our purchase???
Had Keurig for years, got this and astonished at the difference; this brewer makes a great cup of coffee, and its hot!!!
This is so well made. After throwing out 3 Kueric that were not made well, I decided to try a different product. it's awesome.

review name: A lot in a little Maker
review text: I needed a single cup brewer for my Mom. This maker is light, little space taker and gives the option of brewing a cup with a stronger brew or regular. As we are trying to pull away from K-pods it has dual method availability meaning it can brew coffee by grounds or pods. Coffee is flavorful and hot. Really impressed with such a little coffee maker.

Needed a smaller single cup coffee maker the would allow you to use your own favorite coffee not only k- cups . This one does both and includes the cup needed for it. The brew cycle is almost instantaneous and quiet. Not like the keurig it replaced that was extremely noisy and slow.

review name: The Simplicity of this Coffee Pot..‚ù§Ô∏è
review text: Luv it from the minute I took it out of the box..The color and how simple it is to set up and use..But most of all luv the Bold taste feature..Luv a hot cup of coffee with great taste..This one is a keeper..‚ù§Ô∏è

review name: Excellent coffee maker on day one!
review text: Delivery was fast and came one day earlier than expected per the shipping tracker. Makes great coffee and hot right out of the cup.
Coffee grounds in every cup of coffee! So disappointing! I had to buy a strainer to put on top of the coffee cup before making coffee to prevent grounds being in cup.
works well but is slow and makes a constant humming sound when plugged in

review name: Makes a really good cup of coffee
review text: Got this for our guest suite, and tried it for several mornings ourselves. Like it a lot. Easy to use and makes a good cup of coffee. Not sure whether it was the Peete's k-cups we bought or the machine (or a combination of the two), but definitely the most flavorful coffee we've experienced from any similar machine.
This coffee maker is small but a great machine! It brews your coffee quickly and the coffee is piping hot when it‚Äôs ready, which I like! I would purchase this brand again.
Good

I was so excited to get this coffee maker because it‚Äôs the first one I ever heard of that makes coffee hotter, unlike kuerig machines which have never made coffee hot enough for me. Well, approximately 2 weeks past the time to start a return it quit on me, just builds up pressure but no coffee. So I read helpful ways to check it out and it said take a straightened out paper clip and poke thru holes on either side of top poker part and eventually we got a couple cups out and the next morning the same thing happened. I contacted customer support several days ago and no response. I loved this coffee maker and it doesn‚Äôt take up much counter space and I‚Äôm heartbroken it only lasted 2 months and no customer support.
A outstanding working unit. This unit seems to work better than the popular brand that is I‚Äôve had much better luck with it just hope it keeps up that way

review name: Excellent product; sizing, ease of use, easy to clean.
review text: I love the design, color and the fact it doesn't take up much counter space. It's easy to use, easy to keep clean and the water level is very easy to see.

I have had keurig‚Äôs in the past‚Ä¶the last couple I had didn‚Äôt last very long yet kept being quite expensive. So I thought I‚Äôd try a different brand that has the same concept as the keurig ‚Ä¶this coffee maker uses the same pods, makes a nice hot cup of coffee, great taste ‚Ä¶..the only thing I didn‚Äôt like was it only came in white.

Another great product from Instapot makers and this one doesn‚Äôt disappoint. For the price it does a fantastic job of brewing great coffee, especially with the bold option. I was almost about to buy Keurig when one of my friends told me about this. I tried different pods and liked McCafe premium roast the best. They go well together.

Quality is good. This is much better than all previous single serve coffee makers I have had.
Definitely worth the price.

Easy to use for fast hot coffee. My old Keurig wasn't getting as hot as it once was, so after 6+ good years we needed a replacement, this is the one! Very happy with my purchase. This little coffee maker takes up half the space and delivers a very nice hot cup in no time at all.
Very happy with this coffee maker. Makes hot coffee with good taste. Make sure you don't grind your coffee beans too fine when using the reusable pod, the water will back up and over flow.

Worked great for exactly 2 months.
Will not
purchase again and do not
recommend
Got one for my office and love it! So convenient and easy to use and clean. Love the option of using pods or reusable filter.

I like the look of this item but am having a problem getting it to close with the coffee pod in it. I use Tayst compostable pods but had no problem with my previous Kuerig coffee maker. if I don't hold it closed while it's brewing, steam shoots out. I will probably be returning it

It was amazing for the first 3 months. But then it started to act up. Started to behave as though there wasn‚Äôt any water, even when it was full. And then finally, it just started to release hot water and no coffee. It‚Äôs officially a goner now, and I need to buy a replacement that will last me longer. üòî

review name: Makes great coffee and saves money!
review text: I replaced an old Keurig brewer with this. I love being less wasteful, and saving money at the same time! I bought an extra filter for convenience.

review name: It works great, but not for long.
review text: I purchased this on Jan 31, 2023. Today is March 27, 2023, and it is no longer functional. It wouldn‚Äôt brew, so I followed the instructions for a cleaning and descaling. It will not even run the descale cycle. I worked on it, trying to coax it to work to no avail. This machine was over 100.00 when I purchased it. Until it failed, it made a very good cup of hot coffee. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it, however, since researching the topic this morning I discovered this is a common problem at the TWO MONTH mark. Ridiculous.

review name: Love my new coffee maker! I‚Äôve tried and returned others. This one is a keeper.
review text: I love the size, color and one strong cup of coffee.

Carafe came broken. I contacted Instant Pot and was told they would get in touch with me in 2 days for a replacement. 10 days later never heard from them. Decided to just return it although I liked that it was so small.

My Keurig made machines have a limited lifespans the last few purchases, so I wanted to try another company. After using this one, which has a smaller size with a smaller water reservoir, all I can say is I love the size. Can‚Äôt speak for longevity yet but so far very pleased with the purchase.
This coffee maker is super convenient. Brews very quickly. Easy to use and easy to clean. Uses any coffee pod. It also comes with a reusable pod if you like to grind your own beans. I love it.

I have to update my review. We were very happy with this coffee maker until it quit working. It bought it in May and it stopped working today, September 4th. And we were traveling for three weeks in that time period. Certainly won't purchase another one!
Perfect! Makes coffee quick, hot super easy to use. I love how slim it is & fits perfect in tight place. Love this coffee maker highly recommended the purchase.

review name: The value is heads above the price.
review text: Saves counter space, easy to operate, and the flavor is note worthy.
This my second one I bought the Grey one had the black there very easy to use makes great coffee wish they come out with new colors like teal I'd definitely would buy it

review name: Quiet, easy to use, but leaked
review text: My single use Mixpresso was getting very loud and I thought it time to replace it. The Instant Solo was quiet and made hot liquid (170 F). Unfortunately, water leaks out of the bottom of the reservoir. Removing and reseating it did not fix it so I had to return it.
This one is set up in our air bnb. It‚Äôs a winner!

I could not post my first review. The product, cute as it is does NOT hold up. Coffee was ok at best. In-laws warned us about it after we bought so it's "a thing" that doesn't work. I had to go thru Amazon after going thru the other routes that were asked of me. Amazon did refund me after all of that initially MINUS the restocking fee.
I hope this helps someone make a decision.

review name: More trouble than it is worth!
review text: I loved the size and it brewed good coffee, but mine required cleaning the needles and descaling about every two days or all the keys would blink and it would not brew. This is not what I want first thing in the morning-especially about every other morning. This company will not issue refunds unless bought directly from them. They sent suggestions about why it might not be working so I did all the maintenance two more times and it worked for two days and started blinking again. They offered a replacement if I would send pictures of stickers, etc which I did and now they want me to send them pictures of it NOT working. I have put it away and drug out my Keurig three times now and refuse to waste an more time on it. I wanted a small coffee maker to save counter space in my apartment. I should have ordered another Keurig!

review name: Great product easy to use and fits any counter top
review text: Love this coffee maker!

review name: 2nd try and this one is defective, too
review text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and the first one immediately blew steam everywhere and the back got very hot. It seemed to have an electrical problem based on the smell of burning wires. We requested a replacement which we got on Jan 2, but after 1 month of use, it is making odd high-pitched sounds, blowing steam everywhere, and also seems to have an electrical issue. The size is great for small spaces, and when it works, the coffee tastes good. The fact that this is the second one that is defective is very worrisome, but we are now beyond the return date of Jan 30. I hope the seller, Amazon.com Services, LLC, reads this to provide a solution.

It's perfect if you don't have compostable pods, I tried the SF Bay brand and the machine doesn't close all the way. Design flaw but other than that it brews great! I use the reusable filter for tea too.
Love this single serve coffee maker. It's easy to use, has a decent water reservoir and brews quickly! Would recommend this product.
I think it uses more water than what it marked.
Easy to use. I love that you can choose 8,10, or 12 oz. Their is also a bold button for stronger coffee. My kids use it with hot cocoa or cappuccino pods. Fast and hot.

I first purchase this product a little over seven months ago. It stopped brewing completely, and the company was nice enough to replace it not even less than two months of having this new machine and it‚Äôs already doing the same thing brewing very slowly and I can already tell that it‚Äôs going to eventually stop brewing all together, I love the brand but not for coffee machines. Sadly, I feel like I will have to find a different brand.
I loved my coffee make, easy to use, a good space for water and much better coffee

review name: Thought InstaPot was a good brand. Cheaply made.
review text: Cheaply made silver piece to open unit broke after second use. Can still open it but it is a pain.

UPDATE- Instant Brands has amazing customer service! I contacted them and they sent me a new machine. I wanted to give it some time before I updated my original review (below) and I can say that I have been happy with the replacement. I have not experienced the needle ‚Äúclogging‚Äù problem. The only remaining issue is that it will still splatter if your cup isn‚Äôt tall enough. I have fixed that by putting something on top of the cup holder that hikes my mug up closer to the spout. I hope Instant comes up with a better solution for this common complaint. I‚Äôm changing from 3 stars to four because of this remaining issue. Overall it‚Äôs doing it‚Äôs job and makes a good, hot cup of coffee! Based on their customer service support I would recommend this coffee maker- Thanks!

I love Instant Brands. I have an Instant Pot pressure cooker and it works perfectly! I needed to replace my Keurig Elite coffee maker, that after many hard working years has begun to act a little ‚Äúquirky‚Äù.
I heard about Instant‚Äôs foray into the coffee maker market, and after reading reviews and seeing it on sale, I gently suggested it to my son as a Christmas gift to me. ü§ó Unfortunately, after using it for the last week, I‚Äôve discovered a fatal flaw in the machine.
First of all, I‚Äôve had to get creative in order to not have water sputtering all over my counter when making a cup of coffee. I added a drip tray that‚Äôs an inch high to raise the cup up a bit closer to the drip spout. This helped with the messy delivery of coffee into my chosen mug. There's an additional problem of the cup size VS the actual ounces that you get in your cup. It‚Äôs at least 2 ounces more of coffee - so if you chose 8 Oz cup you‚Äôd receive 10 Oz. This limits your size choices tremendously. You can‚Äôt use a smaller cup - it will overflow your coffee into the drip tray. That brings us to the bigger problem- this morning I put my mug onto the drip tray, and attempted to make a cup of (much needed) coffee. The machine made half a cup and then started chiming with all lights on the control panel blinking until I turned off the power. There was water in the reservoir, so I turned it back on and tried with a fresh pod. Then it made noise, sent steam out of the upper edge of the pod compartment and sputtered clear water into the cup. I researched the problem and found that the needles needed to be cleaned. It‚Äôs been one week!
This never happened with my Keurig! It requires maintenance (which I diligently did) but after months of use.
When I cleaned the needles I discovered that the needle in the underside of the lid (which pierces the top of your k-cup) has holes that run sideways- so when it plunges into the pod, the wet coffee grounds tend to stick inside, compelling you to have to clean it often! That‚Äôs not ideal.
On a positive note- it‚Äôs a nice looking machine with a tiny footprint (perfect for my art studio) and it made fairly hot coffee.
At this point I‚Äôm thinking I‚Äôm returning this machine and I hope that Instant reads these reviews and comes up with a product worthy of their brand name. From my past experience- they do have great customer service!
Thank you- I hope this review helps!

review text:
I wrote a review of this thing after using it for a few months and having nothing but issues with it. Support offered no troubleshooting or information on it and instead wanted me to look into the issue for them, provide videos and serial numbers, ect. Having gotten a replacement unit from Amazon directly I can finally see how this thing was supposed to work to begin with.

A good model isn't crazy loud, isn't spewing steam everywhere, doesn't sometimes put out only hot water, and doesn't stop brewing randomly to make beeps and flashes that aren't documented anywhere and no one knows what they mean.

After about a month with a good model I can say it isn't a bad product when it works. Many issues still stand so you're still better off using tumblers over coffee cups to avoid splashing since it isn't height adjustable, someone with a 3D printer can fix that if you know someone.

Still conflicted on the model since the first unit was so bad but will reconsider elevating this to a 4/5 if it lives for few months without issues occurring.
